sentences.sentence: The new law appears to penalize the poorest members of society.
sentences.translation: 新法规似乎不利于社会中的最贫困者。

sentences.sentence: It is paradoxical that some of the poorest people live in some of the richest areas of the country.
sentences.translation: 某些最贫穷的人却住在这个国家一些最富有的地区，这似乎很矛盾。

sentences.sentence: We aim to help the poorest families.
sentences.translation: 我们的目标是接济最贫困的家庭。
